updates.title: New Level: Crystal Palace
updates.content: We're excited to announce the release of our newest level, Crystal Palace! Navigate through an ancient ice palace filled with challenging puzzles and beautiful crystal formations.

updates.title: Double Jump Power-up
updates.content: A new power-up has been added to the game! The Double Jump ability allows players to perform an extra mid-air jump, opening up new possibilities for platforming.

updates.title: Daily Challenges Update
updates.content: We've expanded the daily challenges system with new objectives and rewards. Complete unique tasks each day to earn special collectibles!

updates.title: Performance Improvements
updates.content: We've optimized the game's performance across all devices. Enjoy smoother gameplay and faster loading times!

updates.title: New Penguin Character
updates.content: Meet Frosty, the newest playable penguin character! Unlock this special character by completing the Arctic Storm level.
